text: @NYGovCuomo @DebraMessing My 93 year old uncle, many residents and staff are now battling Covid19. He’s vowed to stay alive to vote on Nov 3. He’s beaten cancer a few times and is going to fight like hell to survive Trump’s ineptitude.
